title: Mordekaiser r and Aatrox w interaction
body: So basically whenever an Aatrox lands his w on a Morde the Morde can just hit r and the chains disappear dealing no damage or knockback effect pls fix.

replies.body: It's supposed to do that. Morde's R doesn't take projectiles or spells to the death realm, so they have no effect when in there. Morde's Q will actually miss if you use it right as his r wears off.
